item.title: Creating This Site
item.description: The first few attempts I made at creating a website were pretty abysmal. My instinct tells me that if I want to learn the web, I better make my site from scratch in order to maximize my exposure to as many technical details as possible. However, this strategy turns out to be a complete meme, and my website has been on the backburner for years now. Every time I start I get bored and quit after “CSS Tutorial #31: Rotating a Div”.
